chapter.text: ^1000 ^media ^2000 You open the locker and jump back as what's inside begins to shift and fall out. ^1500You stare at your history teacher stuffed in the locker. ^1500You can’t stomach looking at her any longer and shut the locker closed with a squish. ^1500You’ve had enough of this monster. ^1500You want to leave. ^1500You don’t care if the monster gets in your way.
